description: Returns a vector of subsequent integers beginning from 0.

name: Value
description: Create an extreme range of points.

name: index_name
description: Name of the index column that may be generated to plot against.

name: point_data
description: Generates JSON that describes points data.

name: numeric_column_count
description: Returns the number of numeric columns for the plot.

name: axes
description: Generates JSON that describes plot axes.

name: get_x_value_type
description: Returns whether the x axis should be time/date. This is either a column named 'X' or the left most column

name: process_to_json_text
description: Default preprocessor for the scatter-plot visualization.  Generates JSON text describing the scatter-plot visualization.

name: to_json
description: Generate JSON that can be consumed by the visualization.

name: get_lazy_visualization_data
description: Return a sub-window of a table. The window is defined by a cell row/col and line/chunk coordinate as origin and the extent of the window in text chunks and lines. The size of a chunk (the characters in it) is defined by `chunk_width`. The output is formatted as a message that can be sent to the IDE's lazy text visualization.

name: compute_table_update
description: Compute the table visualization update. The table update contains information about the table layout and the table content.

name: compute_vertical_indices
description: Returns a vector that contains a pairs of row index and vector of corresponding lines indices.

name: get_chunks_for_row
description: Compute the text chunks for the row/line defined by the given indices limited to the given column indices. The number of chunks to get is defined by `chunks_to_get`.

name: max
description: Return the max value in the given vector.

name: get_longest_line
description: Return the longest line in the given text.

name: get_column_width
description: Return the length of the longest line in the given column.

name: get_row_height
description: Return the height of the row defined by the given index.

name: find_first_over_cum_sum
description: Return the index of the first item in the given vector that brings the cummulative sum of items above the target value. If no such item exists, return `Nothing`.

name: find_end_column
description: Return the index of the column that is at the end of the given text width, when starting from the given start column index.

name: find_end_row
description: Return the index of the row that is at the end of the given text height, when starting from the given start row index.

name: fold_map_inner
description: Helper for fold_map that takes a function, an accumulator value and the current item and returns a tuple of the new accumulator value and the result of the function.

name: fold_map
description: Map a function over a vectors, but also pass on a accumulator value from one step to the next. The function must return a tuple of the result of the function and the new accumulator value.

name: map_to_cumulative_sum
description: Return a vector of the cumulative sum of the given vector.

name: enumerate
description: Return the given vector where each item is mapped to itself and its index in the vector.

name: to_json
description: Generate JSON that can be consumed by the visualization.

name: get_lazy_visualization_text_window
description: Return a sub-window of a string. The window is defined by line/chunk coordinates. The size of a chunk is defined by `chunk_width`. The output is formatted as a message that can be sent to the IDE's lazy text visualization.

name: make_grid_visualization_response
description: Format a chunk of text and meta information for the lazy visualization.

name: get_item_from
description: Return a chunk of text from a string. The chunk is defined by a its size and a line/chunk index coordinate.

name: get_chunk_from_line
description: Return a chunk of text from a line. The chunk is defined by a its size and a chunk index.

name: process_to_json_text
description: Default preprocessor for the warnings visualization.  Generates JSON text describing the warnings visualization.

name: get_widget_json
description: Basic preprocessor for widgets metadata visualization.  Returns full annotation data for all requested arguments.
